title: Birthday wish (Riot)
body:
Dear Riot

It's my birthday on February 3rd and I was wondering if I could have a few games of League of Legends with a couple of riot members, I will play any role but ADC and I'm a non toxic summoner(well I'm now unlike when I was in bronze but those days are long gone). It's a simple wish for my birthday but it will be highly appreciated if you could. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

-- Thank you, from Mutley

P.S. you can't make the title bold.

replies.body:
What time works for you?

Could we do 7pm Sydney time?
Well I just realized that i might be at mums but if I'm not at mums in the after noon anywhere from 2:30pm to 11pm SA time would be fine. I'll just check with mum what time im here at dads.
ok so I can play after school (since my bday falls on the first day of school again :|) from 4:30pm SA time to 11pm whatever suits you best.
Find out when you're free and lets lock down a time.

Sorry OP to post here, and Happy Birthday glad your dreams came true! :)

Maraudaur can you please come over to http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/oEpuQhhg-what-time-will-legendary-snowball-start and tell us what the situation is?
The event is supposed to start at 12AM Pacific Standard Time, which would be 7PM AEDT.
7pm Sydney time 3rd of February is a good time for me.

Not really cause for Christmas (got all my presents 3 weeks early(yea thats pret sad i will admit) I got:

- Pool table. (7" by 3")
- Xbox 1. (1 controller)
- About 35 games for the Xbox.
- Riot points.
- New clothes.
- Apprenticeship paid off.

so I don't really want much more but i got told I'm getting some new clothes and a soccer ball on my B'day and a PS4 which is mine and my bros(but I'm leaving the house soon since I'm 17 in 42 days so don't really need much more and im giving him the PS4) though I wouldn't mind some money for other financial issues that might come up.
jesus christ how rich are your parents... i get a couple of teeshirts and $100 from my parents for birthdays :/

Well the Xbox and Pool table both equal to 1.2K roughly was paid by all my friends and family each paid roughly $50-100. The Soccer ball was $10. Shirts were plain colored $5 ones(about 4 so $20 there). Apprenticeship I paid over 75% of that but parents got the other 25% i only really got 4 games but 1 was a bundle of 35 atari games or something like that (fifa16 - gears of war - Ori and the blind forest) which all came with the Xbox. It was only a $10 riot point card from one of my other friends that I see only once in a blue moon.

and I live in a split family so its kinda a 50-50 thing for my parents.
